item.title: Neural Network based Object Recognition: Fast/Faster/Mask R-CNN, SSD, and YOLO
item.description: Table of Content History AlexNet ResNet Inception Network Series Deformable Parts Model Overfeat Metrics: mAP Precision and Recall Average precision (AP) mean average precision (mAP) R-CNN Families RCNN Selective Search Bounding Box Regression Non Maximum Suppression Workflow Speed Bottleneck Fast-RCNN ROI pooling Workflow Faster-RCNN Mask-RCNN Single Shot Detector Single Shot MultiBox Detector(SSD) You Only Look Once(YOLO) YOLOv1 YOLOv2 YOLOv3 Summary Reference Materials It’s well known that deep learning has been a real game changer in machine learning, especially in computer vision.
